sentences.english: It was right then I started thinking about Thomas Jefferson…
sentences.chinese: 没错，我很尽看，于是我开始考虑杰弗逊起草的。

sentences.english: Jefferson never said. As such, the addition is often attributed to him directly.
sentences.chinese: 杰弗逊从来没有说过，因此除了经常归因于他。

sentences.english: Mr. Jefferson is really a big shot.
sentences.chinese: 杰弗逊先生可真是个大人物。

sentences.english: He next sent Monroe to Paris in 1803.
sentences.chinese: 接着，杰弗逊在1803年再次派遣门罗去巴黎。

sentences.english: One such self- confident rationalist was Thomas Jefferson.
sentences.chinese: 托马斯杰弗逊就是这样一个自信的理性主义者。

sentences.english: Jefferson and his fellow-examiners struggled to come up with a definition for “invention.”
sentences.chinese: 杰弗逊和他的同事们为“发明”的定义而奋斗。

sentences.english: And later, President Thomas Jefferson scoffed at the idea of having a day of thanksgiving .
sentences.chinese: 之后，杰弗逊总统还对这件事嗤之以鼻。

sentences.english: The Jefferson Memorial is a very beautiful white building in the shape of a circle.
sentences.chinese: 杰弗逊纪念堂是一座极其美丽的白色建筑，呈圆形。

sentences.english: As an adult, Jefferson himself was considered among Virginia's 30 richest.
sentences.chinese: 成年后，杰弗逊就荣升弗吉尼亚前30名的巨富之列。

sentences.english: Jefferson had an appetite for action.

definition: Roosevelt (name)/Theodore Roosevelt (1858-1919), US President 1901-1909/Franklin D. Roosevelt (1882-1945), US President 1933-1945
Kennedy (name)/J.F. Kennedy (1917-1963), US Democrat politician, president 1961-1963
Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), American writer, scientist, inventor, politician and diplomat
pinyin: Ben3 jie2 ming2 · Fu4 lan2 ke4 lin2

definition: Hoover (name)/Herbert Hoover (1874-1964) US mining engineer and Republican politician, president (1929-1933)
Dwight D. Eisenhower (1890-1969), US army general and politician, Supreme Allied Commander in Europe during World War II, US President 1953-1961
Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, President 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Bush (name)/George H.W. Bush (1924-2018), US president 1988-1992/George W. Bush (1946-), US President 2000-2008
